---
title: "patient-shared.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines the `PatientDataCarequality` class, which extends the `PatientExternalDataEntry` class and is used to store Carequality-specific patient data, such as discovery status, document query request details, and document retrieval start time. 

## Symbols

### `PatientDataCarequality`
#### Description
This class represents Carequality-specific data associated with a patient, extending the base `PatientExternalDataEntry` class. It includes properties for tracking patient discovery status, document query requests, and document retrieval.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| discoveryStatus | `LinkStatus` \| undefined | (Optional) The status of the patient discovery process. |
| scheduledDocQueryRequestId | string \| undefined | (Optional) The ID of the document query request triggered during patient discovery. |
| scheduledDocQueryRequestTriggerConsolidated | boolean \| undefined | (Optional) Indicates whether the document query request trigger has been consolidated. |
| documentRetrievalStartTime | Date \| undefined | (Optional) The timestamp when document retrieval started. |

#### Outputs
This class does not have explicit output values. It is used to store and manage data.

## References
- `PatientExternalDataEntry`: This class is defined in the `@metriport/core/domain/patient` package.
- `LinkStatus`: This type is defined in the `../patient-link` file and represents the status of a patient link.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| @metriport/core/domain/patient | Provides the `PatientExternalDataEntry` class. |
